TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveProjectBase

summary.span: 确定非 MSBuild 项目引用的输出文件。

span.span: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput`任务搜索设置的项目 Guid 和其相关联的输出列表在 Visual Studio IDE 的特殊属性。The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the Visual Studio IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs. IDE 只预解析非 MSBuild 项目，并以这种方式将从非 MSBuild 引用 MSBuild 项目引用。The IDE only pre-resolves non-MSBuild projects and in this way separates MSBuild project references from non-MSBuild references. IDE UnresolvedProjectReferences 形式返回的 MSBuild 项目的列表。The IDE returns the list of MSBuild projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences. 这使该任务使用功能更强大的 MSBuild 机制来操作只是 MSBuild 项目引用，例如，到引用的特定目标的调用来获取清单文件名称，是不可能使用的 MSBuild 和非 MSBuild 混合列表项目引用。This enables the task to use more powerful MSBuild mechanisms to manipulate just the MSBuild project references, such as calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of MSBuild and non-MSBuild project references.

summary.span: 获取或设置使用 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的项目引用项。

span.span: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

value.span: 使用 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 格式的项目引用项。

span.span: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 Visual Studio 只预解析非 MSBuild 项目，因此无法使用输出的预解析的列表进行解析的项目引用项的 MSBuild 格式。Since Visual Studio only pre-resolves non-MSBuild projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the MSBuild format.
